title: Hell's Hallway
description: From the author who brought you Hell's Christmas comes the back-story you've waited for. In Hell's Hallway, we revisit Monika Hell before she became the Monika Hell we love to hate...or should that be hate to love? How many doors have to close in Monika's life before God opens the one that changes everything? Just how long will Monika stay in the hallway?
author: Cynthia P. Willow
